{{ddcl|header=mdspan|since=c++26|1=
template&lt; std::size_t PaddingValue = std::dynamic_extent &gt;
struct layout_right_padded;
}}

Every specialization of {{tt|layout_right_padded}} is a {{named req|LayoutMappingPolicy}} which provides a layout mapping that is similar to {{rlpt|layout_right/mapping|layout_right::mapping}} except that it has a ''padding stride''.

Every specialization of {{tt|layout_right_padded}} is {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}}, and {{c|std::is_trivially_default_constructible_v&lt;T&gt;}} is {{c|true}} for any such specialization {{tt|T}}.

Let {{c|m}} be the instance of the mapping type {{rlt|mapping|layout_right_padded::mapping}}. The padding stride of the mapping is the second to last stride {{c|m.stride(rank() - 2)}} which is guaranteed to be at least the last extent value {{c|m.extent(rank() - 1)}}, called ''extent to pad''.
